title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu. It should be present.
OB: When I open the context menu, I do not see the 'Team' entry.
EB: When I open the context menu, I expect to see the 'Team' entry.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the project containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file or the other resource to open the context menu.
3. Verify if the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu.
